jld.title: PPC Marketing for Any Budget
description: Did you know Justia Amplify offers PPC management for any budget and up to $1,000 in Google Ads credit for clients new to PPC?

Choose Justia Amplify Advance if your monthly PPC budget is greater than $1,000/month and you want to advertise on various platforms. If your budget is smaller, choose Justia Amplify Starter to add Google Ads PPC to your marketing plan.
